description.narrative: Support development of projects on Innovation for Inclusion - reducing inequalities and leaving no one behind

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1. Number of key ministries’ representatives participating in the workshops and tentative procedure on accession of Marrakesh Treaty in Vietnam 2. Number of IP and Legal Aid professionals participating in the training and engaging them in the network on accession of Marrakesh Treaty in Vietnam 3. Availability of the study – Scaling from 0-2, where: 0 report not available, 1: report drafted and shared for consultation; 2-report finalized 4. Availability of the study - Scaling from 0-2, where: 0 report not available, 1: report drafted and shared for consultation; 2-report finalized 5. Number of enterprises/business initiatives participating in the event and media engaging in; numbers of applications submitted to Blue Swallow initiatives 6. Number of applications submitted; finding the winning team and following up on their impacts after the competition

comment.narrative: 1. 10 ministries’ representative 2. 40 IP and legal aid professionals 3. Rate: 1 - report drafted and shared for consultation 4. Rate: 1 - report drafted and shared for consultation 5. 100 enterprises/business initiatives; 10 media; 161 applications to Blue Swallow initiatives 6. 42 applications; found 3 winning teams

1. 02 workshops on developing advocacy roadmap for the Marrakesh treaty accession in Vietnam 2. 01 technical capacity building on the Marrakesh Treaty for Intellectual Property and Legal Aid professionals for Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) 3. 01 study to strengthen the alignment of the National Law on Persons with Disabilities and International Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (CRPD) and other international standards 4. 01 study to review the national policy framework on the employment for PwDs, international best practices as well as best corporate practices to hire PwDs and PwDs as entrepreneurs 5. 01 Inclusive Business Forum to increase diversity and inclusion policies and practices in the business sector to stimulate economic growth and accelerate the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals (SGDs) in Vietnam 6. 01 competition to seek for the innovative solutions to increase the accessibilities for PwDs

1. 02 workshops on developing advocacy roadmap for the Marrakesh treaty accession in Vietnam was successfully organized, one in 29 Aug 2019 with the participation of related governmental ministries and the other in 29 Oct 2019 with the participation of representatives from ministries and international experts sharing experiences 2. 01 technical capacity building on the Marrakesh Treaty was delivered successfully with the participation of more than 40 IP and Legal aid professionals 3. 01 study to strengthen the alignment of the National Law on Persons with Disabilities and International Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (CRPD) and other international standards is tentatively completed and available for use by end of year 4. 01 study to review the national policy framework on the employment for PwDs, international best practices as well as best corporate practices to hire PwDs and PwDs as entrepreneurs is tentatively completed and available for use by end of year 5. 01 Inclusive Business Forum was successfully launched in Ho Chi Minh City on 11 Oct 2019 6. 01 SDG challenge competition was successfully organized and the gala award took place on 9 Oct 2019 and found 3 winning teams
Fund source is TRAC and closed by Dec 2019 hence no results in 2020
Fund source is TRAC and closed by Dec 2019 hence no results in 2020
